import React from 'react' import {BrowserRouter, HashRouter, Route, Switch } from "react-router-dom"; import { ApolloClient, ApolloProvider, InMemoryCache } from '@apollo/client' import Title from './components/layout/Title' import { Layout } from 'antd' import AddPerson from './components/forms/AddPerson' import './App.css' import People from './components/lists/People' const { Content } = Layout const client = new ApolloClient({ uri: 'http://localhost:4000/graphql', cache: new InMemoryCache() }) const App = () => (
{/* A looks through its children s and renders the first one that matches the current URL. */} </Content> </Route> <Route path="/" exact > <Content className='App'> <Title /> <AddPerson /> <People /> </Content> </Route> </Switch> </HashRouter> </div> </ApolloProvider> ) export default App
